thread.title: Tips to get most from Montara Mountain’s great outdoors
thread.title_full: Tips to get most from Montara Mountain’s great outdoors - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Tom Stienstra
title: Tips to get most from Montara Mountain’s great outdoors
text:
Photo: Tom Stienstra, The Chronicle On the hike to the summit of Montara Mountain, you get this view south to Pillar Point and along the San Mateo County coast On the hike to the summit of Montara Mountain, you get this view...
Montara Mountain looms high on the San Mateo County coast, one of the Bay Area’s top 10 recreation destinations. On the hike to the summit of Montara Mountain, you get this view south to Pillar Point and along the San Mateo County coast On the hike to the summit of Montara Mountain, you get this view...
Montara Mountain looms high on the San Mateo County coast, one of the Bay Area’s top 10 recreation destinations.
